Detailed Description

template<class T>
class Sylph::Core::MutableIterator< T >

MutableIterator provides a transparant interface for iterating over collections.

Each Iterable should have a specific implementation of this class. In case a certain method cannot be implemented (e.g. insert() when a collection does not support insertion) it should throw an UnsupportedOperationException.

MutableIterator differs from Iterator by giving extra options for mutating the collection it iterates over.
